93d39406-0e74-41a0-813b-f5bee09f6087.name: 盟友（@人物@）
93d39406-0e74-41a0-813b-f5bee09f6087.notes: May lower frequence to 12 or less

252dcd44-e0b3-4e4d-b1e7-b3da3d31d435.name: 仆从
252dcd44-e0b3-4e4d-b1e7-b3da3d31d435.notes: IQ 为 0 或者有奴性

0c9c96a3-0ed6-417e-8bee-8e3b4f6fd6e7.name: 感同身受
0c9c96a3-0ed6-417e-8bee-8e3b4f6fd6e7.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0

03428188-2987-4fb6-95c8-4a38e20fb700.name: 感同身受
03428188-2987-4fb6-95c8-4a38e20fb700.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

a8081392-165b-40b8-a40d-60c6d7216c23.name: 感同身受
a8081392-165b-40b8-a40d-60c6d7216c23.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡

ccbf7fbd-fdb4-4b51-b66c-0576bcc2e91b.name: 感同身受
ccbf7fbd-fdb4-4b51-b66c-0576bcc2e91b.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

3404323c-3a87-4196-9d1f-8e118ba50607.name: 特化
3404323c-3a87-4196-9d1f-8e118ba50607.notes: @一 纲生物（如“哺乳类”或“鸟类”）@

8b5846ef-4698-411d-8f8f-7465adabcc05.name: 特化
8b5846ef-4698-411d-8f8f-7465adabcc05.notes: @一科生物（如“猫科动物”或“鹦鹉科动物”）@

21cd1765-510f-4a5d-90cd-32fdab5a0dac.name: 特化
21cd1765-510f-4a5d-90cd-32fdab5a0dac.notes: @一种生物（如“家猫”或“金刚鹦鹉”）@

9fe692ee-f866-4e5f-b54f-43e0ea79e5b0.name: 慢速
9fe692ee-f866-4e5f-b54f-43e0ea79e5b0.notes: 你每 12 小时额外恢复 1 HP

f5c6112c-9edf-44c1-b03f-2d3804f74a04.name: 常规
f5c6112c-9edf-44c1-b03f-2d3804f74a04.notes: 你每 1 小时额外恢复 1 HP

b5c5c547-8e1c-45cd-bd5d-4dbc5f1e1581.name: 快速
b5c5c547-8e1c-45cd-bd5d-4dbc5f1e1581.notes: 你每 1 分钟额外恢复 1 HP

cfa6b41b-cb6e-416b-b4a0-58e66b433f24.name: 高速
cfa6b41b-cb6e-416b-b4a0-58e66b433f24.notes: 你每 1 秒额外恢复 1 HP

e3298cd7-9a73-4cd1-8691-e10703127e1a.name: 极度
e3298cd7-9a73-4cd1-8691-e10703127e1a.notes: 你每 1 秒额外恢复 10 HP

9acb609e-fe96-486f-bd06-0bda5129c3b5.name: 影响人群
9acb609e-fe96-486f-bd06-0bda5129c3b5.notes: 几乎所有人，刨去@一大群人@

e41c4a5c-c8fa-4423-9426-cff8cb492148.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

8ae12e4e-85a8-4cdd-aa69-74989090bd5e.name: Weapon Bond
8ae12e4e-85a8-4cdd-aa69-74989090bd5e.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you. As many as you can afford

6112497f-f322-44d6-89d3-992faa7e72f4.name: 能使用超自然能力获得情报

9c43abb2-1719-4f00-b08a-3cf8e94de9e8.name: 能使用超自然能力获得情报

29df19a7-6ca0-4852-95d5-ea47e9c1efbf.name: 能使用超自然能力获得情报

80fab370-d66a-48c8-b089-e3e4bbdfdf5a.name: 能使用超自然能力获得情报

70144883-7add-4cbd-a31e-30cf903de7fe.name: 高痛阈
70144883-7add-4cbd-a31e-30cf903de7fe.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

4e5ca0ae-176c-44ba-a242-44fcaccc1827.name: Luck, Extraordinary
4e5ca0ae-176c-44ba-a242-44fcaccc1827.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play; Replaces Luck [15]

ab83ae67-2b31-4ae2-a254-e4c962f2b40c.name: 标志性装备
ab83ae67-2b31-4ae2-a254-e4c962f2b40c.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

8d196bd7-2202-455f-851c-9a9f2650218a.name: 战斗反射
8d196bd7-2202-455f-851c-9a9f2650218a.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

8a574172-5255-4037-b6a1-0f0d4612f0b7.name: 幸运
8a574172-5255-4037-b6a1-0f0d4612f0b7.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

d68aebeb-ff49-467a-9258-348ee389c147.name: Mysticism Abilities
d68aebeb-ff49-467a-9258-348ee389c147.notes: Put leftover points in the following advantages

12276620-3790-43dc-bb8b-b9de4cc60dd7.name: 期待陪伴
12276620-3790-43dc-bb8b-b9de4cc60dd7.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

58018b02-328c-4011-bd7c-b8f14d0a3bf9.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
58018b02-328c-4011-bd7c-b8f14d0a3bf9.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

4cbdef54-9340-4bd0-aca7-4d2df284d5fc.name: 范围：任何与你不同的人

0b621aa4-ada9-4577-9204-65704d4d1ab4.name: 视力不良（远视）
0b621aa4-ada9-4577-9204-65704d4d1ab4.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

7361a39a-444c-4393-8e97-a2b44ad993f3.name: 视力不良（近视）
7361a39a-444c-4393-8e97-a2b44ad993f3.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

6b938cbd-8858-49fa-9887-b738edd4b9a6.name: 邪恶双生子
6b938cbd-8858-49fa-9887-b738edd4b9a6.notes: 在你拥有的能力上更加强大或拥有你没有的能力

7de1e4ed-9de3-4003-9342-e71f4419cf50.name: 邪恶双生子
7de1e4ed-9de3-4003-9342-e71f4419cf50.notes: 在你拥有的能力上更加强大且拥有你没有的能力

c3029ca5-ecbb-47d4-b8f9-e5ce81fea6e3.name: 社会污名（少数群体）
c3029ca5-ecbb-47d4-b8f9-e5ce81fea6e3.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction in own group

8ddca5d1-182c-4c6c-9a17-3e62db6c859c.name: Vow (Help those in need who ask)

580061fb-73a9-48dc-8f7c-49c4a17e7105.name: Guns
580061fb-73a9-48dc-8f7c-49c4a17e7105.specialization: Pistol OR Rifle OR Shotgun OR SMG
